entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
